Title: Donnie Brasco
Overview: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and identifies more with the mafia life at the expense of his regular one.
Keywords: undercover, colombia, mafia, mobster, dirty cop, informant, stealing money, marriage counselor, shaving cream, playing cards
production_companies: TriStar Pictures, Mark Johnson Productions, Phoenix Pictures, Baltimore Pictures
Cast: Johnny Depp, Al Pacino, Michael Madsen
